page.title: 03HOME LIFE
page.content: AT HOME WE HAVE A LOT OF ELECTRICAL APPLIANCES TO HELP US WITH DOMESTIC WORK-WASHING MACHINES THAT WASH DIRTY CLOTHES,TUMBLE DRYERS TO DRY THEM INSTEAD OF HANGING THEM ON A WASHING LINE OUTSIDE IN THE WIND, COOKERS WITH GRILLS,OVENS AND HOBS TO HEAT UP OR COOK FOOD,DISHWASHERS FOR DIRTY CUTLERY AND CROCKERY,MICROWAVE OVENS FOR QUICK COOKING(EVEN FROZEN FOOD), REFRIGERATORS TO KEEP FOOD COOL AND FRESH,FREEZERS TO STORE FROZEN FOOD FOR LONG PERIODS, VACUUM CLEANERS TO SUCK UP DUST,FOOD MIXERS FOR EASY PREPARATION OF FOOD,COFFEE AND TEA MAKING MACHINES. MY DAILY ROUTINE IS NOT STRENOUS. ON 5 DAYS A WEEK I GO TO SCHOOL FROM 8.45AM TO 3.15PM.WE CAN EAT A MEAL AT LUNCHTIME WHICH IS PREPARED IN THE SCHOOL KITCHEN OR EAT ONE WHICH WE BRING OURSELVES.
